issue.title: www.news.com.au
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.news.com.au/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.news.com.au%2F) ### Comment > when blocking the element, the whole page becomes frozen ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/q3gngx58twgkc84wkgk4w8844kkg80wss6hx1yk180.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nboi19ejssg0okokckgkwwgkw0g84coe3nikvo46d4.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.0 (4960) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0 Browser: | Firefox License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `1.15`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media Custom filters: | User rules (url: none) Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)
AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js) Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://www.news.com.au/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.news.com.au%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=1.15&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.4&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.20.0+%284960%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.news.com.au%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.enabled=false&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.19045.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%3B+rv%3A135.0%29+Gecko%2F20100101+Firefox%2F135.0&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=win&win.wfp=true)

comment.body:
> Please enable AdGuard Popups filter.

Have this filter enabled and still experiencing same issue.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.news.com.au/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.news.com.au%2F) ### Comment > Every loading of the news website on various browsers and devices prompts this pop up. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4vuwk2do00000owgkkggc800gcgo4g0nogb03a0k40.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.9 System version: | IOS 18.3.1 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Other extensions used: | N/A
